thread.title: Escort Announces Major News Webcast
thread.title_full: Escort Announces Major News Webcast - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Escort Announces Major News Webcast
text:
Escort Inc.
Works With Leading Industry Experts
PHOENIX , Sept. 28, The category leader and innovator of the majority of detection protection patents, Escort Inc. (EscortRadar.com) , today announced that they will be party to a major news webcast scheduled for live webcast tomorrow, Sep 29 th Noon ET ( 9 AM PT ).
Escort is the category leader and designer of the multi-awarded SEMA Show "best new product" winner (2013), the original PASSPORT Max™ High Definition DSP radar detector and the SEMA 'best new product' (2011) winner with the Escort Live™ ticket protection app that helps drivers by providing unprecedented social networked and shared ticket protection and road information to drive smarter.
For more information on the Escort PASSPORT Max™ Radar Detector and the Escort Live™ ticket protection app, visit EscortRadar.com or, call the company direct at 866.709.8744.
About Escort Inc.
Escort is the leading manufacturer of high-performance radar and laser detectors and the patented Escort Live™ real-time ticket protection network. Escort manufactures products under the Escort, PASSPORT, Max, REDLINE, SOLO, Pro and BELTRONICS brands. The company is headquartered in West Chester, Ohio , with its principal manufacturing facility located in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada . Additional information about Escort, Inc. is available at EscortRadar.com.
Editorial Contact:
Ron Gividen
513.870.8500
